title: Attackspeed Twisted Fate

replies.body:
but you're not useful at all before you get sated, you're hoping and expecting your team to win their lanes because you wont be ganking as much, or efficiently, at all. its super easy to counterjungle, especially a tf, it just doesnt happen as much in bronze/solo q

also i dont see any tf games at all in your history, and most of your devourer games you've lost, nice try at pushing your own meta troll, shouldve chose warwick, hes getting stronger anyway

> [{quoted}](name=GigaPube,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=43TEONsK,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-07-15T12:16:50.229+0000)
> also i dont see any tf games at all in your history, and most of your devourer games you've lost, nice try at pushing your own meta troll


This is the kind of attitude that stagnates game development.

yes 1 insignificant bronze/silver/gold-or-so OCE player has finally figured the be-all OP pick of all OP picks and we must all congratulate him for his fine work and evidence hes put into proving how broken this build is

Let me fix that comment up,

> Yes, one OCE player found a build that he considers OP, we must all congratulate him for his fine work and honesty, sharing his experiences and thoughts in a champion and build.


> 1 insignificant bronze/silver/gold-or-so OCE player has finally figured out

If everyone was insignificant, no one would stand up. The point of a board is to post things you figure out regardless of your importance.

It doesn't change the fact its op. It's not helping to win with my internet atm. It does work, I know I haven't done it much, but I can get friends to do it, they like trying new things.  

also

> I know it seems retard and stupid, but it is actually so op if you can use it its not funny.

and I never said anything about being really good at using it myself. I'm really bad at this game to start with, and the current lag doesn't help. When someone like me can use it, what would happen if someone good uses it. It can somewhat 2v1 well, the only trouble I had was when my team died in a 3v5 and their team just collapsed on me under towers 5v1. You cant help losing when they do that, when they are all full build and 2 of them have ruin elixirs.

You should try it, and if you can use it, have fun melting everything in sight
I disagree you can use stun card for ganks. And at lev 6 you can ult in on lanes.
a Runaan's hurricane is actually better than sated devourer on AS TF
No devourer is broken, hence why you run it for this to be viable.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=43TEONsK,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-07-15T01:12:46.485+0000)
>
> No devourer is broken, hence why you run it for this to be viable.

TF with Runaan's hurricane will proc his E on every auto attack as long as he hit three targets

Hmm, what's better, getting your E off every 3 attacks and bonus magic damage, or slightly higher AA speed and better waveclear?

I prefer the Sated Dev, but TF jungle isn't easy.

any shit works in bronze

 i won a game as on hit attack speed nunu
but this shit is {{champion:4}} , automatically 300x better

Basically, imagine if Yi had a stun.

And devourer is broken on any champion.

akali. that's hilarious, I have fun with that one

also, would it, would it really? azir? he uses w not aa, so no dev effect, only gets as benefit

More like tank twisted fate
{{item:3111}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3083}}

I tried that AS porc'ing machine build (I also built AD and crit in that tho) ages ago, it can work wonders, as long as you don't get to pull the blue card every sodding you double tap W in tense situations.

This build is pretty cool, I remember once I had a TF go jungle and do a simlar build with Runaan's. We were losing for about 25 minutes then bam he hit 4 items and carried the game haha.

Personally I much prefer atk speed AP kayle, I know she doesn't have a stun but I really enjoy her ult in combination with the slow and move speed buff with heal.

I play twisted fate a lot and i always take Nashors Tooth anyway, its very good on him in that window where Q and W are on cooldown, not only does it make his basic attacks do significantly more but it makes E stack quicker because of the AS, it also makes taking towers much easier and makes his Ult backdooring much better because of the extra damage/AS, i cant say i have tried full attack speed twisted fate, but it sure seems like an interesting concept.
